extendedInfo.description: Fisher boy is a game where the player has to help the fisher boy catch the fishes for his shop. It would be profitable for him if he catches big fishes as that earns more points for the fisher boy. Tap on the fish and the fisher man would push the fish rod to exactly the point where you tapped, to catch the fish for you. The challenge lies in the motion of the fish. The player has to tap on the route of the fish so that by the time fisher boy throws the fish rod to snap the moving fish, it catches it exactly. As you move to higher levels, the challenges would increase. Play and grab as much points as you can.Catch the different types of fishes and collect the points  and complete the target score within the level time interval. Try to catch big fishes and collect extra  point for getting best score.

reviews.title: Addictive Game
reviews.comment: I  am keep on playing this game. I would like to have more levels.
reviews.author: A Google User
